line: Coming into a courtyard, I see one of the mansion's windows broken, as if something was thrown out of it.
Looking below the window, I notice something white and frilly laying in the broken bushes.
The pile moves around, seemingly trying to climb out, but only manages to get more tangled up.
As I slowly approach to get a better look, my foot lands on a branch which snaps with a loud click.
The pile jumps up and runs away to the east!

speaker: I
line: (Not quite sure, but it kinda looked like a maid's silouette.)
